name: Unified Luminaire Data File
summary: Learn about .ULD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DIALux is a free program used to design and plan lighting installations for different environments with different room elements. Commonly used for homes, office buildings, neighborhoods, sporting facilities, and commercial sites.
NOTE: Similar to the .LDT, .ELD, and .IES files used by DIALux.

description: Data file used by DIALux, a professional light planning software for indoor and outdoor lighting; contains data about the lighting specifications of a luminaire, such as the fixture description, fixture image, luminous flux, power consumption, and a 3D model for viewing; cannot be created by the user, only used for viewing.
